---
id: swap
title: "Swap"
description: "Swaps a current doc for a new doc."
api: 
info_path: docs/answers/answers
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Swap</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"patch"} path={"/answers/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Swaps a current doc for a new doc.
## Request
<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime request"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><ul className={"request-schema-first-body-node-container"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The id of the doc currently in the embeddings database. This doc will be removed.","example":"451335129797767430"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"text"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The content of the new doc.","example":"This is the new doc..."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"access"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","example":"staff"},"description":"An array of strings that denote the groups that have access to these docs. Defaults to 'public'.","example":["staff","students"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tags"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","example":"Test"},"description":"An array of strings representing tags for the docs being inserted. Defaults to an empty array.","example":["Test"]}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>
<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div></div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
